synopsis.text:
Team up for the ultimate beach battle in 'Alice Gear Aegis,' an anime adaptation of COLOPL's popular 3D smartphone shooting game! This summer, witness the M-1 Tag Team Grand Prix, where powerful duos compete for the title of top mermaid and a grand prize of 10 million yen. But it's not just about skill and strategy; these fearless warriors must also face unexpected obstacles like a colossal frog and a menacing cyclone.

As the crowd roars, each team is introduced, and the stage is set for a unique and thrilling competition. But there's a twist: to access the anime's episodes and discover the outcome of this electrifying tournament, you'll need to scan a QR code found within one of three exclusive figures. Depending on the figure you choose, the ending will change, offering multiple exciting possibilities.

Get ready for a high-stakes, action-packed adventure where the line between game and reality blurs. Will you rise to the challenge and uncover the true champions of 'Alice Gear Aegis'?
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
